name: Mavka
resist: acid, fire, necrotic; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: The mavka's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
Constant: protection from evil and good
At will: create or destroy water, dancing lights, ray of frost, resistance, witch bolt
3/day each: darkness, hold person, inflict wounds, invisibility, silence
1/day each: animate dead, bestow curse, blindness/deafness, contagion, dispel magic, vampiric touch

trait.name: Nightmare Mount
text: A mavka is bonded to a nightmare when it is created. Mavkas are encountered with their mounts 95% of the time.

trait.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
text: The mavka takes 20 radiant damage when she starts her turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, she has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The mavka makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (4d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 11 (2d10) necrotic damage.
